original_text: Then Leah and her children came and they bent down in front of Esau. Last of all, Joseph and Rachel came to Esau and they also bent down to the ground.
korean_text: 레아도 그의 자식들과 더불어 나아와 절하고 그 후에 요셉이 라헬과 더불어 나아와 절하니

sentences.original_text: Then Leah and her children came
and they bent down in front of Esau.
Last of all, Joseph and Rachel came to Esau
and they also bent down to the ground.
